items.name: The Gull
explicitMods: Trigger Level 1 Create Lesser Shrine when you Kill an Enemy
75% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
50% increased Duration of Shrine Effects on you
flavourText: "It is the Gull that delivers Man unto Ancestor.
The consumer of our flesh. The seeder of our
souls unto the earth. We give the Gull his life.
The Gull gives us our Way."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that aren't triggered.
explicitMods:
Gain 1 Momentum when you Use a Supported Skill
Gain 1 Momentum every 0.51 seconds while Channelling a Supported Skill
Lose all Momentum if you Move
Supported Skills have 20% increased Attack Speed per Momentum

When you reach 5 Momentum, lose all Momentum and gain
Swiftness for 1.5 seconds
Swiftness grants 15% increased Movement Speed per Momentum lost
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. hybrid.secDescrText: Targets a corpse, and deals spell damage to enemies around the corpse, as well as causing the corpse to explode, dealing fire damage. The explosion is not affected by modifiers to spell damage and cannot be reflected. This will continue to target other corpses in the area, with an increasing delay between each one, until it runs out of corpses or has destroyed 22 corpses.
